schema.name: currency
schema.description: Retrieve exchange rates for multiple currencies based on a specific currency, the unit is 1. Default base currency is cny

base_currency.description: The base currency, needs English lowercase. If the user does not provide a base currency, please use cny.

exchange_currencies.description: Currency names for which exchange rates need to be retrieved, English lowercase. Multiple currencies separated by |, default is usd|try|ngn

prompt: This function should only be used once to retrieve multiple currency exchange rates. If the user does not provide a currency type, please use cny as the base currency, and usd|try|ngn as the exchange currencies for which exchange rates need to be queried.
